CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Venus Concept Inc is a medical technology company. It develops, commercializes and delivers minimally invasive and non-invasive medical aesthetic and hair restoration technologies and related services. The company's products include NeoGraft, Venus Viva, Venus Legacy, Venus Versa, Venus Velocity, Venus Heal, Venus Bliss, ARTAS systems and others. The company provides medical devices and treatments for hair, body, and skin related problems. It operates in the U.S. as well as in other international countries.
